discussion.p: The specification can be read to require the existence test. As this introduces a race, the existence test must not happen.
Change to: "Effects: p is removed as if by POSIX remove()."

resolution.p: This wording is relative to SG3 working draft.

blockquote.p: Effects: If exists(symlink_status(p,ec)), itp is removed as if by POSIX remove().
